basic.blooming: Flowering period March-April, fruiting period May-June
basic.color: Flower color white, fruit color red, golden, black

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove old, diseased and dead leaves timely, after flowering remove the upper part staring from 5 cm above soil surface, leaving 3-5 leaves
